topic.title: machine learnign for more relevant results
topic.description: Which papers describe methods to find more relevant results using machine learning?
topic.narrative: Relevant papers describe one or more methods to find more relevant results using machine learning. Papers about just machine learning in IR in general or papers just about finding more relevant results are not relevant.

topic.title: Crawling websites using machine learning
topic.description: Papers that describe how to use AI to crawl the context of websites more efficient.
topic.narrative: Papers in this topic describe methods and algorithms to use machine learning for crawling. They also contain information on the latest research findings on the topic. Papers about crawling methods without AI are not relevant for this topic.

topic.title: Recommenders influence on users
topic.description: Papers that describe the change in user behaviour by recommenders?
topic.narrative: Relevant papers describe how users are affected by recommenders, papers about the recommenders from a technological point of view are not relevant
